attributes.action: do not take Britain into the euro keep the pound
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: don't change to the euro. going into the euro will be a bad thing to do for britain. other countries have regrets about changing currencies. i was in a EU country for a holiday and was told that with the euro prices go up but the wages don't, and they were better of when they had their own currency. tax will also go up.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
